text: Chanel is a French fashion company created by Coco Chanel (19 August 1883 â€“ 10 January 1971). It designs clothing, perfumes, luxury goods and jewellery, usually of simple design. It is widely known for the "little black dress" and Chanel No. 5 perfume. Category:Chanel Category:1909 establishments in France Category:French fashion houses
title: Chanel
